sentences.sCn: 那只古老的钟大声地嘀嗒着。

sentences.sContent: ...a clear recognition of self orientation and personal interest will decide whether you will tick the box of vocational college or university...

phrases.pCn: [口语]一会儿，一刹那间，一转眼间

words.tran: 滴答响的东西；自动收报机；钟表；断续器
坚质条纹棉布或亚麻布；（指钟表发出的）滴答响声

trans.tranOther: if a clock or watch ticks, it makes a short repeated sound
A tick is a written mark like a V. It is used to show that something is correct or has been selected or dealt with.
to mark a test, list of questions etc with a tick, in order to show that something is correct, to choose something etc
